Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior, the lower section of which is ribbed, is covered with light-brown slip and remains of a red-painted cursive text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394930) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394930)
